sn55.44:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo’ti vuccati.
sn55.44:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.44:2.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti;
sn55.44:2.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
sn55.44:2.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo’ti vuccatī”ti.
